popularityCurve.label: in the days leading up to and following my testimony my friends told me amazing and poetic basketball stories about their fathers sons and jump shots these were love stories

clusterList.phrase: in the days leading up to and following my testimony my friends told me amazing and poetic basketball stories about their fathers sons and jump shots these were love stories

dad coached me in junior and it was nice to have him behind the bench with me for the super series it was a good experience in terms of having him as a coach as compared to a parent at home it's obviously two different stories at the rink it's business and it's intense but i kind of knew that and expected that i think he was a great coach and mentor for me when i was 16 17 years old
i have very fond memories of when i was my son's age of just sitting around and listening to my dad talk to other coaches talk about hockey
my dreams were pretty big for hockey and i have to tell you most of them were fulfilled
